lines.line: So how is the sorting going?
Err...
It's going well, especially now I have all the bones I need.
There are still a few bits and pieces I wouldn't mind, but that's the way things go.
Well if I see any bones I think you might like I'll bring them over.
Cheers, we, err, that is myself and the museum staff, really appreciate it.
I have some bones for you.
Great! Let me take a look at them.
Wonderful! I'll put this with the rest.
No problem. I'll be back if I find some more.
Great! Just clean them up in the pot-boiler and hand them over.
That...that covers all the bones I was searching for!
Well I'm glad to have furthered the cause of the museum.
I just hope everyone will enjoy the finished displays.
Yes, I'm sure EVERYONE will get a chance to enjoy my work.
Hahahahahahahahahaha!
Bwahahahahahahahahahahaha!
MWUHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!
Sorry.
Well anyway, I have a few items I've put together in my spare time if you want one.
I have a ram skull helm or a snazzy bonesack like mine.
Which would you like?
The helm.
Good choice!
Come and see me if you lose that one, I have plenty more!
The bonesack.
Well chosen, I knew you had taste!
Can I have both?
I... Well... I do have many of each. I suppose it wouldn't be a problem.
Well, as much as I'd like to toss them into the dirt and all, I think it's best if you came back later with an empty backpack.
I do think they go well together, actually.
Come and see me if you lose either one, I have plenty more!

characters.name: Odd Old Man
characters.description: Elderly male, British accent, nervous and evasive tone, constantly pausing with 'err' and 'umm'. Claims to be an archaeologist but seems to be hiding something, often consulting his mysterious bone sack for guidance.
